Hera

Hera is the self-given name of the ex-Charon Immortal Heratrexisykeari, who presides over the Charis.

Origin

Originally one of the immortal Charon Yamaraj, a Soul Steward who joined Marlien from the Great Beyond to ensure the wellbeing of atman, Heratrexisykeari was a figure of significant power even amongst the other yamaraj, with whom she reigned over the Charon for the lifetimes of many mortals. Still, she was unable to break the bonds of physical form palced upon her kind by the {creation:Marlien:dead_gods]] until after her aquisition of the Ubrik Pearl, an ancient artefact of great power.

By wielding the power of the Ubrik Pearl Hera is able to alter her form freely, as well as that of her servants. This new-found freedom lead to a shift in her outlook; Hera's efforts to ensure the well being of mortal atman have since been far more direct than those of the Charon, though she acts now primarily through her dea.

Appearance

Although as a Charon Immortal Hera would ordinarily be bound to the shape of a Yamaraj, the Ubrik Pearl allows her to freely alter her form. The general aesthetic of the Charis follows her own ostentatious preference, though Hera herself has a predilection towards shades of blue, green, and bronze.

When spying on mortal affairs or appearing as an omen, Hera usually chooses the form of a peacock or peahen; likewise, the plumage of her Yamaraj form, the vestments of her humanoid forms mimic the patterns of a peacock.

Nature

Hera rarely uses her power to directly influence mortal affairs, preferring to sustain an order of pseudo-immortal Charis, while herself merely observing from the outer Planes, or disguised as some simple creature.

Other Names

Lonwendo - In Xienonxionin Mythology.
